title: PASSEPORT CARBONE
description: Passeport Carbone is a web app created within the junior enterprise for the University of Technology of Troyes, aiming to raise student awareness about their carbon footprint. I led UI/UX design and handled most of the front-end development.

title: présences
description: Présences is a web mapping app developed by Makina Corpus to manage office space in a flex-office context. During my internship, I redesigned the web and mobile UI and added several quality-of-life features, the most significant being authentication.
